channel.title: TOS Help
channel.description: Not sure this is where this goes but I got a question. I was trying to add a mopar server tos thingy but I have some questions. On my site which is here = http://warpedskillz.x10.mx/forums/agreement.php See when I go to http://warpedskillz.x10.mx/forums/ How can I get the T.O.S to pop out? Like the first page a person sees when they first see my site? And another question, how can I disable the "yes" at the bottom and just use a agree button?

item.title: TOS Help
item.dc:creator: @RsGhd RsGhd
item.description:
@RsGhd wrote:

Not sure this is where this goes but I got a question. I was trying to add a mopar server tos thingy but I have some questions. On my site which is here = http://warpedskillz.x10.mx/forums/agreement.php
See when I go to
http://warpedskillz.x10.mx/forums/
How can I get the T.O.S to pop out? Like the first page a person sees when they first see my site?
And another question, how can I disable the “yes” at the bottom and just use a agree button?

Read full topic
